information.title: Information
information.aboutDescription: This Carbon Footprint Calculator follows standard GHG Protocol methodologies to calculate your organization's carbon emissions. The calculator uses three scopes of emissions as defined by the Greenhouse Gas Protocol Corporate Standard.
information.globalFormulaDescription: For any emission source where Methane (CH₄) or Nitrous Oxide (N₂O) are involved:
information.globalFormulaExplanation: Where CO₂, CH₄, and N₂O are in kg, and 28 and 265 are the Global Warming Potential (GWP) values for CH₄ and N₂O respectively.
information.scope1InfoDescription: Direct emissions from sources that are owned or controlled by your organization.
information.scope2InfoDescription: Indirect emissions from the generation of purchased energy consumed by your organization.
information.scope3InfoDescription: All other indirect emissions that occur in your value chain.
information.naturalGasFormula: Converted to GJ (m³ × 0.039492), then emissions calculated per GJ
information.heatingOilFormula: Converted to GJ (L × 0.0344), then emissions calculated per GJ
information.coalFormula: Converted to GJ (tonnes × 22.55), then emissions calculated per GJ
information.gasolineFormula: Converted to GJ (L × 0.0319), then emissions calculated per GJ
information.dieselFleetFormula: Converted to GJ (L × 0.0353), then emissions calculated per GJ
information.dieselGeneratorsFormula: Converted to GJ (L × 0.0353), then emissions calculated per GJ
information.refrigerantsGWPNote: Refrigerants use direct Global Warming Potential (GWP) factors:
information.electricityFormula: Converted to MWh (kWh ÷ 1000), then MWh × 698 = kg CO₂e
information.scope2Note: Note: Only CO₂ is counted for this region
information.airTravelDescription: Air travel is automatically categorized based on distance:
information.distanceConversionNote: Distance is converted to miles (1 km = 0.6214 miles) for calculation.
information.shortHaulFormula:
CO₂: miles × 0.215 = kg CO₂
CH₄: miles × 0.0077 g = kg CH₄ (converted to kg)
N₂O: miles × 0.0068 g = kg N₂O (converted to kg)
Apply Global CO₂e formula
information.mediumHaulFormula:
CO₂: miles × 0.133 = kg CO₂
CH₄: miles × 0.0006 g = kg CH₄ (converted to kg)
N₂O: miles × 0.0042 g = kg N₂O (converted to kg)
Apply Global CO₂e formula
information.longHaulFormula:
CO₂: miles × 0.165 = kg CO₂
CH₄: miles × 0.0006 g = kg CH₄ (converted to kg)
N₂O: miles × 0.0052 g = kg N₂O (converted to kg)
Apply Global CO₂e formula
information.trainTravelDescription: Train travel emissions are calculated per kilometer:
information.trainTravelFormula:
CO₂: km × 0.028 = kg CO₂
CH₄: km × 0.0000057 = kg CH₄
N₂O: km × 0.0000016 = kg N₂O
Apply Global CO₂e formula
information.note1: All input values must be ≥ 0 (negative values are not allowed)
information.note2: Empty or zero values are treated as 0 and do not contribute to emissions
information.note3: Results are rounded to 2 decimal places
information.note4: The calculation follows GHG Protocol standards for corporate carbon accounting
information.note5: All conversion factors and emission factors are based on standard methodologies
